text: Spotsylvania County is a county in the U.S. state of Virginia. As of the 2020 census, 140,032 people lived there. Its county seat is Spotsylvania Courthouse. == History == Spotsylvania County was founded in 1721 from parts of Essex, King and Queen, and King William counties. == Census-designated places == * Lake Wilderness * Spotsylvania Courthouse (county seat) == References == Category:1720s establishments in Virginia Category:1721 establishments Category:Virginia counties
title: Spotsylvania County, Virginia
